title: Use the `matches!` macro
body:
You are walking in the woods, a hydra appears: New version of clippy asks you to use the `matches!` macro.

You fix one, another appears, you fix another, you get **thirteen more**.

```
[ ubuntu: lighthouse ]$ make lint
cargo clippy --all -- -D warnings
    Checking ef_tests v0.2.0 (/home/ubuntu/dev/lighthouse/testing/ef_tests)
    Checking clap_utils v0.1.0 (/home/ubuntu/dev/lighthouse/common/clap_utils)
    Checking environment v0.1.2 (/home/ubuntu/dev/lighthouse/lighthouse/environment)
    Checking directory v0.1.0 (/home/ubuntu/dev/lighthouse/common/directory)
    Checking eth2_libp2p v0.2.0 (/home/ubuntu/dev/lighthouse/beacon_node/eth2_libp2p)
    Checking account_utils v0.1.0 (/home/ubuntu/dev/lighthouse/common/account_utils)
    Checking genesis v0.2.0 (/home/ubuntu/dev/lighthouse/beacon_node/genesis)
    Checking beacon_chain v0.2.0 (/home/ubuntu/dev/lighthouse/beacon_node/beacon_chain)
    Checking account_manager v0.3.0 (/home/ubuntu/dev/lighthouse/account_manager)
error: match expression looks like `matches!` macro
   --> beacon_node/eth2_libp2p/src/peer_manager/peer_info.rs:231:9
    |
231 | /         match self {
232 | |             PeerConnectionStatus::Connected { .. } => true,
233 | |             _ => false,
234 | |         }
    | |_________^ help: try this: `matches!(self, PeerConnectionStatus::Connected { .. })`
    |
    = note: `-D clippy::match-like-matches-macro` implied by `-D warnings`
    = help: for further information visit https://rust-lang.github.io/rust-clippy/master/index.html#match_like_matches_macro

error: match expression looks like `matches!` macro
   --> beacon_node/eth2_libp2p/src/peer_manager/peer_info.rs:239:9
    |
239 | /         match self {
240 | |             PeerConnectionStatus::Dialing { .. } => true,
241 | |             _ => false,
242 | |         }
    | |_________^ help: try this: `matches!(self, PeerConnectionStatus::Dialing { .. })`
    |
    = help: for further information visit https://rust-lang.github.io/rust-clippy/master/index.html#match_like_matches_macro

error: match expression looks like `matches!` macro
   --> beacon_node/eth2_libp2p/src/peer_manager/peer_info.rs:252:9
    |
252 | /         match self {
253 | |             PeerConnectionStatus::Banned { .. } => true,
254 | |             _ => false,
255 | |         }
    | |_________^ help: try this: `matches!(self, PeerConnectionStatus::Banned { .. })`
    |
    = help: for further information visit https://rust-lang.github.io/rust-clippy/master/index.html#match_like_matches_macro

error: match expression looks like `matches!` macro
   --> beacon_node/eth2_libp2p/src/peer_manager/peer_info.rs:260:9
    |
260 | /         match self {
261 | |             Disconnected { .. } => true,
262 | |             _ => false,
263 | |         }
    | |_________^ help: try this: `matches!(self, Disconnected { .. })`
    |
    = help: for further information visit https://rust-lang.github.io/rust-clippy/master/index.html#match_like_matches_macro

error: match expression looks like `matches!` macro
  --> beacon_node/eth2_libp2p/src/peer_manager/peer_sync_status.rs:32:9
   |
32 | /         match self {
33 | |             PeerSyncStatus::Advanced { .. } => true,
34 | |             _ => false,
35 | |         }
   | |_________^ help: try this: `matches!(self, PeerSyncStatus::Advanced { .. })`
   |
   = help: for further information visit https://rust-lang.github.io/rust-clippy/master/index.html#match_like_matches_macro

error: match expression looks like `matches!` macro
  --> beacon_node/eth2_libp2p/src/peer_manager/peer_sync_status.rs:40:9
   |
40 | /         match self {
41 | |             PeerSyncStatus::Synced { .. } => true,
42 | |             _ => false,
43 | |         }
   | |_________^ help: try this: `matches!(self, PeerSyncStatus::Synced { .. })`
   |
   = help: for further information visit https://rust-lang.github.io/rust-clippy/master/index.html#match_like_matches_macro

error: match expression looks like `matches!` macro
  --> beacon_node/eth2_libp2p/src/peer_manager/peer_sync_status.rs:48:9
   |
48 | /         match self {
49 | |             PeerSyncStatus::Behind { .. } => true,
50 | |             _ => false,
51 | |         }
   | |_________^ help: try this: `matches!(self, PeerSyncStatus::Behind { .. })`
   |
   = help: for further information visit https://rust-lang.github.io/rust-clippy/master/index.html#match_like_matches_macro

error: if let .. else expression looks like `matches!` macro
   --> beacon_node/eth2_libp2p/src/peer_manager/peerdb.rs:139:9
    |
139 | /         if let Some(PeerConnectionStatus::Connected { .. }) = self.connection_status(peer_id) {
140 | |             true
141 | |         } else {
142 | |             false
143 | |         }
    | |_________^ help: try this: `matches!(self.connection_status(peer_id), Some(PeerConnectionStatus::Connected { .. }))`
    |
    = help: for further information visit https://rust-lang.github.io/rust-clippy/master/index.html#match_like_matches_macro

error: match expression looks like `matches!` macro
   --> beacon_node/eth2_libp2p/src/peer_manager/peerdb.rs:148:9
    |
148 | /         match self.connection_status(peer_id) {
149 | |             Some(PeerConnectionStatus::Connected { .. })
150 | |             | Some(PeerConnectionStatus::Dialing { .. }) => true,
151 | |             _ => false,
152 | |         }
    | |_________^
    |
    = help: for further information visit https://rust-lang.github.io/rust-clippy/master/index.html#match_like_matches_macro
help: try this
    |
148 |         matches!(self.connection_status(peer_id), Some(PeerConnectionStatus::Connected { .. })
149 |             | Some(PeerConnectionStatus::Dialing { .. }))
    |

error: match expression looks like `matches!` macro
   --> beacon_node/eth2_libp2p/src/peer_manager/mod.rs:520:31
    |
520 |                       .find(|v| match v {
    |  _______________________________^
521 | |                         MProtocol::Udp(_) => true,
522 | |                         _ => false,
523 | |                     })
    | |_____________________^ help: try this: `matches!(v, MProtocol::Udp(_))`
    |
    = help: for further information visit https://rust-lang.github.io/rust-clippy/master/index.html#match_like_matches_macro

error: match expression looks like `matches!` macro
   --> beacon_node/eth2_libp2p/src/rpc/methods.rs:280:9
    |
280 | /         match response_code {
281 | |             0 => true,
282 | |             _ => false,
283 | |         }
    | |_________^ help: try this: `matches!(response_code, 0)`
    |
    = help: for further information visit https://rust-lang.github.io/rust-clippy/master/index.html#match_like_matches_macro

error: match expression looks like `matches!` macro
   --> beacon_node/eth2_libp2p/src/rpc/methods.rs:314:9
    |
314 | /         match self {
315 | |             RPCCodedResponse::Success(_) => false,
316 | |             _ => true,
317 | |         }
    | |_________^ help: try this: `!matches!(self, RPCCodedResponse::Success(_))`
    |
    = help: for further information visit https://rust-lang.github.io/rust-clippy/master/index.html#match_like_matches_macro

error: match expression looks like `matches!` macro
  --> beacon_node/eth2_libp2p/src/types/sync_state.rs:50:9
   |
50 | /         match self {
51 | |             SyncState::Synced => true,
52 | |             _ => false,
53 | |         }
   | |_________^ help: try this: `matches!(self, SyncState::Synced)`
   |
   = help: for further information visit https://rust-lang.github.io/rust-clippy/master/index.html#match_like_matches_macro

error: aborting due to 13 previous errors

error: could not compile `eth2_libp2p`.

To learn more, run the command again with --verbose.
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error: build failed
make: *** [Makefile:123: lint] Error 101
```
`A0` due to annoying the CI/CD flow.
